lead_paragraph: Five-times champion Novak Djokovic overcame a first-set spill to beat unseeded Joao Sousa of Portugal 6-4 6-1 in the third round at the Miami Open in Florida on Sunday.
snippet: Five-times champion Novak Djokovic overcame a first-set spill to beat unseeded Joao Sousa of Portugal 6-4 6-1 in the third round at the Miami Open in Florida on Sunday....

headline.main: Djokovic Too Good for Unseeded Sousa in Miami
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Too Good for Unseeded Sousa in Miami
